amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit all granted exemptions to only those companies obligated to begin submitting financial disclosures to the Securities and Exchange Commission after the date of enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 114-414 to limit all exemptions granted therein only to companies obligated to begin submitting financial disclosures to the Securities and Exchange Commission after the date of enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 221 (Roll no. 58).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 221 (Roll no. 58).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Issa.
